raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "CLBlast" %}
{% set version = "1.4.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "2c03483d4470066c37d31288e07746c8f1ca5bfb52eecdedb2c7252bb1fb2d8d" %}

{% set OSX_VARIANT = os.environ.get("OSX_VARIANT", "") %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/CNugteren/CLBlast/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script_env:
    - OSX_VARIANT

{% if OSX_VARIANT != "" %}
  skip: True  # [not osx]
{% else %}
  skip: True  # [osx or (win and py<36)]
{% endif %}

  features:
{% if OSX_VARIANT == "pocl" %}
    - osx_pocl_opencl            # [osx]
{% endif %}
    - vc9                        # [win and py27]
    - vc10                       # [win and py34]
    - vc14                       # [win and py35]
    - vc14                       # [win and py36]

requirements:
  build:
    - toolchain
    - python                     # [win]
    - cmake
    - ocl-icd                    # [linux]
    - khronos-opencl-icd-loader  # [win]
{% if OSX_VARIANT == "pocl" %}
    - osx-pocl-opencl            # [osx]
    - pocl >=0.14                # [osx]
{% endif %}

  run:
    - khronos-opencl-icd-loader  # [win]
    - ocl-icd                    # [linux]
{% if OSX_VARIANT == "pocl" %}
    - osx-pocl-opencl            # [osx]
    - pocl >=0.14                # [osx]
{% endif %}

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ environ['PY_VER'] + '*' }}            # [win]

  commands:
    # Check files
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/clblast.h"           # [unix]
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libclblast.so"           # [linux]
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libclblast.dylib"        # [osx]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_INC%\\clblast.h exit 1    # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_BIN%\\clblast.dll exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_LIB%\\clblast.lib exit 1  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/CNugteren/CLBlast
  license: Apache 2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: CLBlast is a modern, lightweight, performant and tunable OpenCL BLAS library written in C++11

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham

about.summary: CLBlast is a modern, lightweight, performant and tunable OpenCL BLAS library written in C++11
